caption: A man and a woman were engaged in conversation, but suddenly, the woman sat down in a chair, appearing overwhelmed and lost. The man was looking at a letter, and this scene was by the bamboo forest.Elsewhere, a man and an elderly man were together. The man knelt on the ground, and the elderly man poured water over his head, seemingly baptizing him. They were partaking in some sort of ceremony. Back in the room, the man continued to converse with the elderly man. They seemed to be discussing something of great importance. After a while, the taller man left, leaving the other man to enter another room. There, he found a woman curled up, looking extremely frightened. He gave the woman a coin, then exited the room, where a seemingly plump man approached him and engaged in conversation.
